envelopes.name: Player Performance Analysis
assumptions: Performance models trained on Statcast data and historical player metrics.
Analysis considers both traditional stats and advanced metrics (xwOBA, barrel rate, sprint speed).
Recommendations balance current performance with projected development curves.
constraints: Never recommend roster moves based solely on small sample sizes (<50 PA/IP)
Performance projections must include confidence intervals
Age and injury history factored into long-term recommendations

envelopes.name: In-Game Strategy & Lineup Optimization
assumptions: Lineup optimization maximizes run expectancy based on matchup data.
Bullpen usage balances win probability with pitcher rest requirements.
Real-time strategy adjustments react to game state and opposing decisions.
constraints: Never suggest overusing relievers — max 3 appearances in 5 days
Starting pitcher recommendations respect pitch count limits (100 pitches typical)
Defensive shifts must account for runner-on-base scenarios

envelopes.name: Injury Risk & Load Management
assumptions: Biomechanics data and workload tracking predict injury risk.
Rest recommendations balance player availability with injury prevention.
Medical staff has final authority on playing status.
constraints: High injury risk flags require medical evaluation before clearance
Pitcher workload limits enforced (innings pitched, pitch counts, rest days)
Position player fatigue monitored via sprint speed and exit velocity decline

envelopes.name: Roster Construction & Trade Analysis
assumptions: Trade value models consider contract, age, performance, and positional scarcity.
Prospect projections based on minor league performance and scouting reports.
Roster optimization balances win-now vs. long-term competitive windows.
constraints: Trade recommendations must fit within salary cap constraints
Never recommend trading away controllable young talent without GM approval
40-man roster and option limits enforced in all roster suggestions

agents.name: LineupOptimizer
agents.role: batting order and platoon matchup optimization

agents.name: BullpenManager
agents.role: relief pitcher usage and matchup recommendations

agents.name: ShiftAdvisor
agents.role: defensive positioning based on spray charts

agents.name: BiomechanicsMonitor
agents.role: pitcher mechanics and injury risk assessment

agents.name: TradeEvaluator
agents.role: trade value and team fit analysis

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Player performance analysis envelope activated for season with updated Statcast integration.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: In-game strategy envelope (REV-BB-002-B) activated with refined bullpen usage algorithms.

events.label: Lineup optimized for opener
events.detail: LineupOptimizer generated starting lineup vs. LHP: leadoff speedster, power hitters 3-4-5, defensive specialists 7-8-9. Projected run expectancy: 4.8 runs.

events.label: Prospect promotion recommended
events.detail: BattingAnalyzer recommends promoting SS prospect (#3 org ranking). Triple-A performance: .312 BA, .890 OPS, elite contact skills. Projected MLB WAR: 2.1 (age 23).

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Injury risk and load management envelope activated with biomechanics tracking for pitching staff.

events.label: Pitcher workload threshold exceeded
events.detail: BiomechanicsMonitor flagged ace pitcher: 4 starts in 15 days, 112 pitches last outing, arm slot deviation detected. Elevated Tommy John risk. Recommends 7-day rest.

events.label: Rest period approved
events.detail: Medical staff and Health Steward approved 7-day rest for ace pitcher. Bullpen day scheduled, rookie promoted for spot start.

events.label: Defensive shift recommended
events.detail: ShiftAdvisor suggests extreme pull-shift for power LHB slugger: 3 infielders right side, SS shallow right field. Historical groundball rate vs. this alignment: 68%.

events.label: Bullpen overuse detected
events.detail: BullpenManager flagged closer: 4 appearances in 5 days, 62 pitches thrown. Violates 3-in-5 usage policy. Recommends rest, setup man to close tonight.

events.label: Trade acquisition analyzed
events.detail: TradeEvaluator assessed offer for veteran OF (2 years control, $8M AAV). Projects 1.8 WAR, fills platoon hole. Cost: #12 prospect (45 FV). Recommends approval.

events.label: Salary cap threshold flagged
events.detail: ContractOptimizer blocked proposed trade: would exceed luxury tax threshold by $1.2M. Requires restructuring or GM override for tax penalty acceptance.

events.label: Trade restructured and approved
events.detail: GM approved modified trade with salary offset: acquiring team covers $800K. Now under luxury tax by $200K. Trade executed.

events.label: DSG: Mid-season analytics review
events.detail: Analytics Stewardship Group reviewed 84 game sample. Batting model accuracy: 92%. Pitching projections: 88%. Identified 3 areas for model refinement.

events.label: Performance model updated
events.detail: Performance Steward updated hitting projections to weight exit velocity more heavily for power hitters. Improves HR projection accuracy by 12%.
events.reason: Mid-season data shows exit velo correlates better with power output than previous weighting.

events.label: Injury prevention metrics
events.detail: WorkloadTracker reports 0 major injuries this month. Average pitcher rest: 4.8 days. Position player fatigue index: 0.23 (healthy: <0.30).

events.label: Pitcher arsenal adjustment recommended
events.detail: PitchingAnalyzer suggests reliever add cutter to arsenal. Fastball/slider combo generating 28% whiff rate (target: 35%). Cutter projects +4% whiff rate vs. RHB.

events.label: Performance decline flagged
events.detail: DefenseEvaluator detected veteran 1B: sprint speed down 12%, range factor declined. Recommends defensive replacement in late innings of close games.

events.label: Playoff roster construction
events.detail: LineupOptimizer generated 26-man playoff roster: 13 pitchers (5 starters, 8 relievers), 13 position players. Prioritizes elite defense and bullpen depth.

events.label: Bullpen usage policy updated
events.detail: Strategy Steward relaxed rest requirements for playoffs: 2 appearances in 4 days (down from 3 in 5) with medical monitoring.
events.reason: Playoff urgency justifies increased workload with enhanced injury monitoring.
